overview: Putting yourself, your thoughts and soul out there, is an unbelievably scary process. The song Heavy Rotations by Elena Steri deals with the pressure and the range of emotions triggered by said process. It's filled with fragility, but it also shows how you'll grow and leave your doubts behind. The soothing tune is accompanied by dream like visuals that create a world between memories and imagination.
title: Elena Steri – Heavy Rotations
